Materials & Certifications
Sleep well knowing all Puffy mattress foams are CertiPUR-US® certified. This means they are made without ozone depleters, PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP (“Tris”) flame retardants, formaldehyde, mercury, lead, or other heavy metals. The foams have been tested for low VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) emissions for better indoor air quality (less than 0.5 parts per million).
Quick & Easy Setup
Set up your Puffy mattress in 4 easy steps.
STEP 1
Open.
Open the Puffy box and lay it horizontally on your bed frame.
STEP 2
Unroll.
Slide out your rolled-up mattress, pull away the plastic sleeve, and unroll onto the frame.
STEP 3
Release.
Cut the airtight plastic seal and slide it off the mattress. Your Puffy will start expanding.
STEP 4
Relax.
Let your Puffy expand for 2 hours for optimal cloudlike comfort, and enjoy your best sleep yet.

3 PROBLEMS to LOOK for
with OTHER BRANDS…

FTC Violations

Nectar Sleep attained two FTC violations in 2018 and 2021 for falsely advertising its imported mattresses as “Assembled in USA.”

The company had to pay funds up to $800,000 and cease the violations. You can see the FTC charges here. These claims negatively affect the consumers as well as the honest businesses that manufacture their products in the USA.

Every Puffy mattress is made with care and pride in America, using only the highest quality materials.

Who Are You Really Buying From?

Unfortunately, some mattress companies sell mattresses under different brands. Consumers believe they are buying from a different company, when in fact - it's the same one.

For example, Resident Home LLC is the parent company of Nectar, DreamCloud, and Siena while Amerisleep and Zoma have the same parent company.

Puffy does not try to target customers with multiple brands only to purchase what could be the same mattress for a higher or lower price.

Limited Mattress Warranty

When investing in a mattress, it's important to have peace of mind knowing that your product is defect-free and will be durable for many years.

Many online mattress brands offer a limited warranty, which is a restraint on the timespan and coverage of the product. This can be a major concern if the mattress needs replacing or repairing due to a manufacturing or workmanship issue. A few companies that offer a limited 10-year warranty include Leesa, Helix, and Purple.

Puffy offers a lifetime warranty with all of its products, free of charge.

Stain-Resistant Cloud Cover

Hypoallergenic and stain-resistant with an original cloud design. Keeping tidy just got easier with the zip-n-wash feature for easy cleaning.

2

Cooling Cloud™ Foam

Designed to disperse heat away from the body, this 1.5-inch layer of gel-infused foam cradles muscles and joints for maximum comfort in any sleeping position.

3

Plush Dual Cloud Foam

Exclusive to the Puffy Lux Hybrid, this 1.5-inch layer of pressure-relieving foam contours the spine and lower back, cradling the body’s natural curves.

4

Climate Comfort™ Foam

2 inches of humidity-resistant foam designed to manage temperature and promote airflow for sleep that’s never stuffy.

5

Firm Core Support Foam + Contour-Adapt Coils

A 7-inch layer combining individually-pocketed coils and high-density foam for better stability and motion isolation all the way to the mattress edges.

6

Grip Base Cover

Designed to keep your mattress right where you want it, the Grip Base Cover eliminates mattress movement while sitting perfectly on any flat surface.
